examples: the ABCs of emergency heart-lung resuscitation

adjective.description: Relating to or denoting American-born people of Chinese descent.
examples: some ABC parents send their children to Chinese language schools

phrases: economics can be as simple as ABC
She says teaching children to read is as easy as ABC.
The pop quiz was as simple as ABC.
To them, preventing HIV infection is as simple as ABC - A for Abstinence, B for Being faithful and C for Condoms.
The dazzler was John, for whom kindness and consideration towards his customers in the restaurant is as easy as ABC.
origin: 1970s: from the initial letters of American-born Chinese.
